description: Retaining wall templates for civil and residential projects in Australia

templates.name: Concrete Retaining Wall - Low
templates.description: Low-height concrete retaining wall (1.5m) - L-shaped gravity design, suitable for residential applications, no engineering certification required

specifications.reinforcement: N12 bars @ 300mm centres vertical and horizontal

project_context.typical_use: Residential garden terracing, driveway level changes
project_context.site_conditions: Level to moderate slope, good drainage
project_context.access: Standard residential access for concrete truck and excavator

assumptions: Wall height does not exceed 1.5m (no engineering certification required in most Australian states)
Level backfill (no surcharge loads)
Standard residential soil conditions (Class H)
No groundwater issues
Concrete truck access available within 30m
Standard 28-day concrete cure time
No special architectural finish required

templates.name: Concrete Retaining Wall - Medium
templates.description: Medium-height concrete retaining wall (3m) - Cantilever design with engineered footing, requires standard engineering certification

specifications.wall_system: Cantilever retaining wall with reinforced concrete footing
specifications.reinforcement: N16 bars @ 200mm centres vertical, N12 @ 300mm horizontal, starter bars L-bent
specifications.drainage: 150mm slotted drainage pipe with gravel backfill and geotextile wrap
specifications.soil_conditions: Class H to M (sandy clay to clay) - moderate to high reactivity
specifications.engineering_required: Standard structural engineering certification required (1.5-3.5m height range)

project_context.typical_use: Commercial property boundaries, multi-level residential terracing, basement walls
project_context.access: Good vehicular access for concrete trucks, excavators, and crane

assumptions: Wall height between 1.5m and 3.5m (standard engineering certification required)
Level backfill with no surcharge loads (vehicles/structures)
Standard soil conditions (Class H or M)
No groundwater within 1m of wall base
Concrete truck and crane access available
Engineering design provided (not included in rate)
Standard 28-day concrete cure time
Weather delays allowed in program
exclusions: Structural and civil engineering design fees
Council permits, DA approvals, and certification
Special architectural finishes or cladding systems

templates.name: Concrete Retaining Wall - High
templates.description: High-height concrete retaining wall (6m) - Anchored/tieback cantilever system, requires specialist engineering and construction methodology

specifications.wall_system: Anchored cantilever retaining wall with ground anchors or tiebacks
specifications.foundation_type: Reinforced concrete spread footing (2000mm x 1000mm) or piled foundation
specifications.concrete_grade: N50 (50 MPa) for wall, N40 for footing
specifications.reinforcement: N20 bars @ 200mm centres vertical and horizontal, heavy mesh top/bottom, anchor embedment zones
specifications.anchors: Post-tensioned ground anchors @ 2-3m centres, 10-15m length, 150-200kN capacity
specifications.drainage: 200mm slotted drainage pipe with gravel drainage layer, weepholes @ 2m centres
specifications.soil_conditions: Engineered design for site-specific soil (Class M to E) - high to extreme reactivity
specifications.engineering_required: Specialist structural and geotechnical engineering certification (>3.5m height)
specifications.finish: Form-finished concrete with architectural treatment or cladding system

project_context.typical_use: Major infrastructure, commercial developments, basement excavations, hillside developments
project_context.site_conditions: Steep slopes, complex site constraints, may include surcharge loads
project_context.access: Specialist equipment access required - piling rig, drilling rig, large crane, concrete pumps

assumptions: Wall height exceeds 3.5m (specialist engineering and certification required)
Ground anchor installation feasible (suitable founding strata available)
Site-specific geotechnical investigation completed
Specialist engineering design provided (not included)
No adjacent structures within zone of influence (or temporary support designed)
Anchor drilling and testing program included in methodology
Load testing of anchors to 150% design load
Extended construction program (12-16 weeks typical)
Quality assurance inspections by structural engineer
Concrete pump access available (restricted truck access)
exclusions: Site survey, geotechnical investigation, and soil testing
Structural, civil, and geotechnical engineering design fees
Council permits, DA approvals, CC certifications, and BCA compliance
Demolition, excavation support, and underpinning of adjacent structures
Temporary shoring, sheet piling, or soldier pile walls
Dewatering systems, groundwater monitoring, and environmental controls
Piling works if required for foundation support
Architectural cladding systems or facade treatments
Traffic management, road closures, and pedestrian controls

templates.name: Masonry Retaining Wall
templates.description: Medium-height masonry retaining wall (2m) - Mortared concrete block construction with reinforced concrete footing, standard engineering required

specifications.wall_system: Reinforced mortared concrete block retaining wall
specifications.reinforcement: N12 vertical bars @ 400mm centres grouted into cores, N12 horizontal bond beam @ every 4th course
specifications.mortar: M3 mortar (cement:lime:sand 1:1:6) for general blockwork, M4 for bond beams
specifications.drainage: 100mm agricultural pipe with gravel backfill, weepholes @ 2m centres
specifications.soil_conditions: Class H to M (sandy clay to clay) - moderate to high reactivity
specifications.engineering_required: Standard structural engineering certification required (1.5-3.5m height range)
specifications.finish: Rendered and painted, or face block exposed finish

project_context.typical_use: Residential boundary walls, garden terracing, pool surrounds
project_context.site_conditions: Moderate slope, good drainage, stable founding layer
project_context.access: Standard residential access for concrete truck, block delivery, and excavator

assumptions: Wall height between 1.5m and 3.5m (standard engineering certification required)
Level backfill with no surcharge loads
Standard soil conditions (Class H or M)
No groundwater issues
Concrete truck access for footing pour
Block delivery and storage area available on site
Engineering design provided (not included in rate)
Weather protection during construction (mortar cure time)
Standard render finish (allowance included)
exclusions: Premium face block finishes or stone cladding
Special render systems or waterproofing membranes
Coping stones or capping systems (unless specified)

templates.name: Gabion Retaining Wall
templates.description: Medium-height gabion retaining wall (2.5m) - Rock-filled wire basket system with natural finish, standard engineering required

specifications.wall_system: Stepped gabion basket retaining wall (500mm stepped batter)
specifications.basket_type: 1000mm x 500mm x 500mm galvanized wire mesh gabion baskets (4mm wire, 80x100mm mesh)
specifications.foundation_type: Compacted crushed rock base (300mm depth) or shallow concrete footing
specifications.rock_fill: 150-300mm diameter rock (granite, basalt, or sandstone) - min 2.5 T/mÂ³ density
specifications.drainage: Free-draining through gabion structure, 100mm slotted pipe behind wall with gravel
specifications.soil_conditions: Class H to M - suitable for moderate slopes and erosion control
specifications.engineering_required: Standard structural engineering certification required (1.5-3.5m height range)
specifications.finish: Natural rock face, no additional finish required

project_context.typical_use: Landscape features, creek bank stabilization, erosion control, commercial landscaping
project_context.site_conditions: Moderate slopes, areas requiring natural aesthetics and drainage
project_context.access: Truck access for rock delivery, excavator for placement

assumptions: Wall height between 1.5m and 3.5m (standard engineering certification required)
Stepped batter design (100mm step per 500mm basket height)
Level to moderate slope conditions
Rock fill material available locally (60km max haul distance)
Free-draining backfill (no fines or clay)
Basket assembly and rock filling by hand or excavator
Engineering design provided (not included in rate)
No special rock color or type specified (standard local rock)
Standard galvanized baskets (25+ year design life)
exclusions: Structural and civil engineering design fees
Erosion and sediment control during construction
Premium rock types (colored, imported, or specialty stone)
Planting pockets or vegetated gabion systems
